Body:
I am following the document IoT remote monitoring and notifications with Azure Logic Apps connecting your IoT hub and mailbox".

In the section "Add a service bus queue" I am stuck at the step number 3:

 "Open the service bus queue
column9:
and then click Shared access policies > + Add."

When I create a new Access Policy
column10:
after a while the following error occurs. 

SubCode=40000. Partitioning cannot be changed for Queue. . 	TrackingId:8fbca9ae-e20f-40d7-af46-0ce061f1fd7f_M4CH3_M4CH3_G40
column12:
Timestamp:5/16/2018 4:00:46 PM CorrelationId: a6dae9ed-c3c4-432a-b512- 1ab02141f17b

What can be the cause of this issue?

"

Body: What's your service bus resource location?
I was send this issue to the Azure Support, and they said there was an temporary issue on the system. After a short period of time the issue was resolved. Thank you for your interest.
